input:
On the floor, you see several objects arranged in a row: a green fidget spinner, a yellow textbook, a gold teddy bear, a red keychain, a magenta cup, and a turquoise plate. What is the color of the object directly to the right of the teddy bear?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
